Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering this remarkable item to you at a special introductory price of $1,300,000. This offer is tailored to provide you with the best possible value while ensuring we maintain a fair return on our investment. We look forward to your consideration and hope to facilitate a transaction that benefits both parties. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,300,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,300,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
